text_content.paragraph: In this module we discussed the functionality associated with conducting a Contracts search. You also learned how to use the available tools to work with the search results.
You should now be able to:

bullets.bullet: Export search results to Excel, and
Customize search results by changing which columns to display and grouping by column

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.
